website_summaries.verdict: This classic La Mer cream has become a holy grail product among professionals and beauty mavens alike.
pros: Creme actively reduces redness and visibility of scars
You'll notice a difference in 1-2 weeks
The cream feels light and wears well under makeup
A small amount of product goes a long way, especially when you warm the cream between your fingers before applying
Gives skin a natural, dewy look
cons: Product has a potent scent that may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit La Mer
customer_reviews.text: I’m a regular user of the product and this one was a fake. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Is this authentic?
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased La Mer before. This does not have the scent or consistency of those i have bought at Sax. It was sealed but that can be easily done.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE KAVERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Completely clogged my pores and made my breakout. My dermatologist said I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Andi Boutin

customer_reviews.title: Not the product I thought I was buying.
customer_reviews.text: This product was rancid and did not smell fresh. This product was old, I would not purchase this item again from this resource.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great moisturizer; nothing I've ever used compares. You can buy either the solid, heavier cream for your face or the less dense formula that is lighter. I tend to prefer the heavier cream. I heard it was first used to treat burn victims; whether or not that's true it's a wonderful cream. Obviously I wish it wasn't so expensive or could get some discounts.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Dowling

customer_reviews.title: La Mer - which is thick and creamy - works best if you apply a hydrating serum on your face ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 75+ and have very dry skin. La Mer - which is thick and creamy - works best if you apply a hydrating serum on your face before applying La Mer. Perfetto!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Rice

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Looks dried out and hard. Still gets creamy if I warm it up but I don’t think it’s the way it’s supposed to look.
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good and leaves your skin so tight immediately after using
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions carefully.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used LaMer for years. My skin is thin and requires extra care. I’ve tried several other cremes but they don’t work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adoree Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Product works nicely as a daily nighttime moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in order. Product works nicely as a daily nighttime moisturizer. Amazon pricing was competative
customer_reviews.author: Corina S.

customer_reviews.title: Fake or not?
customer_reviews.text: In officiial website, there is no 15ml package. Who can accept possible fake one? Plus it is not cheap?
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Fang

customer_reviews.title: Old dry product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing product but this vendor sent lotion so old and dry had to force it out of container . Pathetic !
customer_reviews.author: Franklin LYNN

customer_reviews.title: La Mer by Lancaster South
customer_reviews.text: Got a small jar from Lancaster South and it came in used.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jeffrey Feit

customer_reviews.title: A good night cream.
customer_reviews.text: A good cream, especially at night. It is heavy for days to me.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Dobrec

customer_reviews.title: No difference from other cheaper brand very high price no results as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive and no as I expected don’t see no results for the high price
customer_reviews.author: mayra fernandez

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: As always I can see an amazing result in just two days. La Mer is the best out there and always has been. When you find something that works....
customer_reviews.author: Melissa English

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on your skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturing cream...and does not seem to negatively affect my Rosacea, so far!!
customer_reviews.author: wiggy

customer_reviews.title: I am a first time user and hope to enjoy the benefits of this highly recommended product
customer_reviews.text: Product was received as ordered. I am a first time user and hope to enjoy the benefits of this highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: zumbagirl

customer_reviews.title: Too dense
customer_reviews.text: A bit too think for every day more like 2x a week
customer_reviews.author: elisa bonora

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I'm confused as to how some people swear by it, it made my skin breakout and become oily by mid day. I did not find it to be better than a typical over the counter moisturizer. I would look elsewhere and spend a 1/3 the money. I've had good experiences with Clinque for Men.
customer_reviews.author: Timo

customer_reviews.title: Really oily and thick
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is thick and oily and made me break out. The ingredients are cheap and not good for your skin. La Mer is nothing but a con, fooling people who are interested in having the "must luxurious" things without researching their quality. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Buy from La Mer
customer_reviews.text: LaMer sells this for 90 dollars!! Why would you buy it here?
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I just opened mine and closed itll I have used La mere for years. FAKE
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Carey

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth and creamy
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift, and I was surprised at how "dry" it felt going on my skin. I know that sounds like an oxymoron, but it felt really thick and heavy. Not creamy and smooth. It did not blend well. If anything, my wrinkles looked a little more pronounced after a few days of use. It felt clogged and dry. I tossed it in a drawer, and dug it out several months later. Same experience. I feel I have better moisturizer, silkiness and suppleness using a dollar store lotion.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

product_meta.title: La Mer The Moisturizing Cream 0.5 oz / 15ml
product_meta.description:
Brand new and manufacturer sealed
Ultra-rich, dewy finish
Born from the sea, the legendary Creme de la Mer has the power to transform the skin. In a short time, firmness improves, lines, wrinkles and the look of pores become less visible, skin looks virtually ageless.
Even the driest complexions are renewed and rejuvenated.
With the nutrient-rich Miracle Broth, the heart of La Mer's profound powers of transformation, skin is immersed in moisture, sensitivities soothed, radiance restored.
feature_bullets: Born from the sea, the legendary Creme de la Mer has the power to transform the skin. In a short time, firmness improves, lines, wrinkles and the look of pores become less visible, skin looks virtually ageless.
Even the driest complexions are renewed and rejuvenated.
With the nutrient-rich Miracle Broth, the heart of La Mer's profound powers of transformation, skin is immersed in moisture, sensitivities soothed, radiance restored.
